TopicTitle: What do you name your space agencies?

Articles.Content: Were called the jupiter corperation
Mason Shipyards. The company focuses primarily on spacecraft design and space exploration, although several reliable aircraft have been developed.
Wormhol3 Space Administration, Wormhol3 Army, Wormhol3 Air Force, and Wormhol3 Navy (Space Navy).
Explosive Propulsion Laboratory; Destructive Testing; Jeb's used spacecraft, co.

I have a save titled "BluPlanet Aerospace Engineering and Tax Collection Services".

I also have the "BluPlanet Mostly Harmless Military Innovations Sector"

Either the Kerbin Aerospace Sciences Administration or the Kerbin Aeronautics and Space Administration.

Not the most creative names, but gives me a good reason to use my KASA flags.
TwentyTwoThousand and The Sandbox Save.
Mine is the Intrepid Space Program

My is the Ouion Federal Space agency. The subgroup of my space Agency is the 1st Nuclear Missile Army regiment 6.

(yes,we do launch nuclear missiles and some warheads are fake and real,but you can't tell the difference.)
I like to use the name RosKosmos, which is a play on Roscosmos, the Russian Federal Space Agency.
KASA, very unoriginal...

General Propulsion Command.

its the space command for my company, General Propulsion(see sig).
Mine is called KRASH - Formerly Kerbal Rocket and Space Headquarters, now Kerbal Rocket and Science Headquarters!

I Remade mine

it is now Ember

it will stand for something later

I haven't really decided what to call my company/government, I want it to be something along same lines as Star Trek, where the whole world gets together to explore space, and I also just started using Fractals Interstellar mod. My first name idea was Federation of United Kerbals but that had a very unfortunate acronym. Then I thought Federation of Savage Kerbals, the acronym is much less unfortunate, but the name implies my Kerbals are Savages, and a savage couldn't build a rocket, so I threw that out. I then thought Icarus Space Agency, but Icarus is used as a fable to teach people to not reach beyond their means and if my Kerbals did that they would never get off the ground, also I want it to be a world government, not an agency. ThatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s all the PR department could think of and I'm told the PR department consists of a peanut shell, some brain matter, they told me not to ask where that came from so I didn't, and a nine volt battery.

So we are still working on a name but the program is going well, we have orbited the Mun and Minmus and our astronauts made it home safely with all the gooey science intact. We have a very strict safety policy and all manned flights must be tested unmanned first and then provided with a means of escape should something go wrong. We have had only two deaths so far and both were caused by an entity that my scientists have named "The Kraken". We are working on an anti-Kraken system but research is going slowly due to one of my scientists missing a small part of his brain, no one knows where thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s gone to.

We love the names others have come up with and my PR department is hard at work using those names for inspiration Thank you for that everyone.

P.S. I saw someone that has an Irish space agency, St. Patricks day must be very easy for Kerbals, they are already green.

My save doesn't have any special name, because I only use the one, besides career mode.

I really like the idea of spacefaring corporations, Wayland-Yutani, SpaceX, etc, so the name I use is Arakyd Industries, after the robotics company in Star Wars. Not for any particular reason other than it sounds cool. I even have a flag, photoshopped by yours truly.

A few I used:

Axe and Hammer Precision Instruments Industries (Shortened to Axe and Hammer PII)

Ara Technica Land-Air Solutions (Shortened to ATLAS)

Belkan Space Program (In before the V2 Mass Retaliation Weapon)
Mine is called Kerbal Space Agency.

The Kernadian Space Agency.

Our ultimate goal is to build the galaxy's largest hockey rink on minmus.

The parent organization is called AlTi AD inc. Aluminum Titainium Aerospace and Defense Incorporated

With a privet space naval force. Called the Naval Academy

The goal of the Alti corporation is to engineer ships for both commercial use and military use.

Edited October 21, 2013 by camulus777

First I thought of something like - Agency of Controlled Explosions [ACE], but then decided that I'm not so much into explosions and went with basic Aerospace Research Bureau [ARB]. And no, I didn't like SRB either (with space instead of aerospace for naming sake), I'm not into SRBs.
Pulsar Aerospace.

Hm. I haven't named mine yet. However, I am a huge W40K fan.

So... Adeptus Kerbales? No... I'm a Chaos guy. But the Kerbals are like Ork- that's it!

Mad Dok Kerbstompa's Kustom Krooza Krew!

First I thought of something like - Agency of Controlled Explosions [ACE], but then decided that I'm not so much into explosions and went with basic Aerospace Research Bureau [ARB]. And no, I didn't like SRB either (with space instead of aerospace for naming sake), I'm not into SRBs.

Heh. My space program is led by Space Research Bureau . I don't have a custom flag yet, but i know how will it look.

Heh. My space program is led by Space Research Bureau . I don't have a custom flag yet, but i know how will it look.

Well, yeah, it's too obvious, so I didn't take it.
